en: Reduces the height of default road curbs.
Automatically adjust height of existing bridge pillars
Curb Height Adjuster can now also reduce the thickness of bridge decks!  Enable this function in the options panel.
Add support for Parking Lot Roads II parking lots
Curb Height Adjuster can now change the pavement and curb heights of Parklife and Campus pedestrian paths
Support Big Suburbs 2-lane roads by hockenheim95
Suport 0.1m sunken + Prague Curbs roads by siudowski
Suport Paris 1900 Cobblestone Roads by Lost Gecko
